channel.title: How to change the strength bonuses of a weapon?
channel.description:
I know this is a noob question so don't flame me for it.
Ok, I need to know how to change the attack bonuses of a weapon but I have no clue how to do it AT ALL. :P So if you can help me with this you can either add my AIM which is steven42594 or post here. Thanks for the help.

item.title: How to change the strength bonuses of a weapon?
item.dc:creator: @darkdude551 darkdude551
item.description:
@darkdude551 wrote:

Ok I think I got it and if as everyone can see Im new to coding so if you got any like newby easy coding things so I can start learning pm me or add my aim steven42594 thanks all[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2008, 10:41:48 PM[/size][hr]ok I did ::update and then I closed and started my server again it says error connecting what did i do wrong I edited the meat_tenderiser and made everything that was a 0 to a 100[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2008, 10:45:09 PM[/size][hr]B
U
M
P

notepad > open > sorce file > all files > items.cfg
and im pretty sure its the thrid to last

item.source: How to change the strength bonuses of a weapon?

item.title: How to change the strength bonuses of a weapon?
item.dc:creator: @dadancinman dadancinman
item.description:
@dadancinman wrote:

use notepad, wordpad, MS word, etc. Then hit ctrl+F and find the item name u want to change, and the first three numbers are buy/sell/alch and the rest are bonuses. str i think is 3rd to last or 2nd to last.

Read full topic
